Accessibility together.

CivicActions Accessibility is an open project and community for CivicActions team members and the community. We want this resource to be useful to our team, our clients, our partners, but also people who want to improve accessibility on the web.

Join us

We're open.

CivicActions Accessibility is an open, agile project and community. We work iteratively, in public. Learn more.
